about_the_game:
After you're done prospecting the mossy ground in search of the next big archaeological discovery, it might be nice to sit down and take a look at what's already been done. Why not to take out the photos of the artifacts you found so far and relive those moments?

Unlock 90 select patterns in a black & white printable format and color them yourself!

How to play:


1) Print out any of the PDF files on a piece of A4 paper.
2) Color any pattern from it with any colors you like (recommended tools: pencils/thin markers).
3) ...
4) Have fun!

By purchasing this 'donation' DLC, you can greatly increase the chance of us making more free games in the future! Thank you. <3

Where to find these pictures:


1) Click the main game in your Steam Library with the right mouse button and choose "Properties..."
2) Open the "Local Files" tab and click "Browse..."
3) The printable files will be waiting for you in the "Printable Patterns" folder.

This DLC doesn't affect the main game in any way!

name: Mossy Pixels: Lucky Find!
short_description: Support the creation of more free games and get 90 printable patterns for coloring as a sign of our gratitude! :)
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
